title: Tstaffor's ASCPII Art
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:isolated-terminal]]
[[include component:ratio-bar base=-- |ex=--]]

[[module css]]
:root {
  --accentColor: 5,195,221;
  --darkColor: 2,9,54;
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source start=--
|name=Tstaffor
|no-right-margin=*]]
You can check out more of my work here: 
[http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/tstaffor-s-author-page Tstaffor's Isolated Containment Terminal]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:author-label-source end=--]]

Deep in the recesses of a Foundation computer terminal you've found it. The records of so many SCP's true forms!

**TrueForms.txt**

Wait what? Oh great, you remember this terminal is only capable of displaying text. You might as well check it out still. As you open it up, you find a treasure trove of secret information. 
Welcome to... **ASCPII!**

++ **Series 1:**
